name: Faraway Fire
description:
A story strategy survival game about camping in the woods. 3 people go on a camping trip in the woods. These woods have monsters that hate campfires. Keep your campfire on to survive. How many days can you survive?

This game was for the OMG jam 6.  My interpretation of the themes was that the campfire keeps you from dying. It was a fun project to work on and I'll make an update to polish up a bit more later.

Follow me on twitter for future work of mine.
